00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_ACTION_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_ACTION_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 #include <QtGui/QAction>
00034 
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 
00037 namespace mimas {
00038 
00046 class Action : public QAction, public ThreadedLuaObject {
00047   Q_OBJECT
00048 public:
00049   Action(const char *name, QObject *parent = 0)
00050       : QAction(QString(name), parent) {
00051     QObject::connect(this, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00052                      this, SLOT(triggeredSlot()));
00053     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00054   }
00055 
00059   void setShortcut(const char *sequence) {
00060     QAction::setShortcut(QKeySequence(QString(sequence)));
00061   }
00062 
00065   void setMenuRole(int role) {
00066     QAction::setMenuRole((MenuRole)role);
00067   }
00068 
00069   ~Action() {
00070     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00071   }
00072 
00073 private slots:
00074   void triggeredSlot() {
00075     lua_State *L = lua_;
00076 
00077     if (!pushLuaCallback("trigger")) return;
00078     // <func> <self>
00079     int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 0, 0);
00080 
00081     if (status) {
00082       // cannot raise an error here...
00083       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'trigger' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00084     }
00085   }
00086 };
00087 
00088 } // mimas
00089 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_ACTION_H_
